topics.body:
"@CogWeaver":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a12aa063687252f41b0500#post_53a12aa063687252f41b0500
What is the best timeline and how do I achieve it?
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a12ad46368724bd8ef0300#post_53a12ad46368724bd8ef0300
The timeline where you open a portal to Equestria for everyone to be able to pass through back and forth freely, forever.

To obtain this, you must endure through the darkest timeline, and then say the right words at the right time to the right person for the right reasons in all the wrongest of ways.  Then, and only then, can this best timeline unfold.

That, or you get me a sandwich.
topics.author: 4fde0c7e945b706cc30003eb
